name: YoYoYokai
description:
Play in your browser here:

https://yoyoyokai.surge.sh/

The Tsukumogami have come out! As the keeper of the shrine, ward off the spirits for as long as you can.

YoYoYokai is a Match-3, Tower Defense game all about combining Yokais to create powerful attacks. 

We would really appreciate it if you left a comment and rating!

Programmers: Donny Wu, Andy Wu

Main Animator: Jeremy Ho

Layout Artist and Additional Animation: Mike Ko

Music and Sound: Edison Tang

Specials thanks: Alvin Ho
